scenariodescription: The robot starts inside a narrow aisle (NODE 79) trying to transport boxes from one end of the aisle to another. At the opposite end of the aisle, a human is standing and needs to reach their goal at the other end of the aisle. The human waits until the robot is not blocking their path. Once the path is clear, the human starts moving towards their goal in the aisle.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 stands at the opposite end of the aisle waiting for the robot to clear the path. Once the robot moves out of the way, Human 1 proceeds with their normal navigation to reach their goal at the other end of the aisle.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot should detect the human at the opposite end of the aisle, say 'PROCEED' and move to the side to clear the path. Once the human starts moving towards their goal, the robot should continue its task of transporting boxes.
